Title: Auto Map Index I
DescriptionLines: All queries in RavenDB use an index.
An **Auto Index** is created when a query does Not specify which index to use, and when there isn't any existing auto-index that can answer the query.

Queries that do not specify an index are called
**dynamic queries**.

Walkthroughs.Title: Define a dynamic query
DescriptionLines: * Define a query without specifying a specific index.

* Adding filtering to a query, using `where()` or `search()`, without specifying a specific index will make the _query_ _optimizer_ analyze the query to see if an index that can answer the query exists.
